{{Location Intro|description=<p>It is a chamber located southwest of [[The Mausoleum of King Deshret]], which the player will access during {{Quest|Dual Evidence}}. Solving its puzzles will grant '''Clearance Level 2''' for the [[Scarlet Sand Slate]].</p>}}

==How to Unlock==
Enter from [[The Dune of Magma]] and explore it until a waypoint is found at the underground system. There is a [[Dendroculus]] nearby on the opening of a small ruin. Inside it is a small tunnel which is accessible to reach the Place of Rebirth.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|Those who ascend to Aaru will burst into living flame once again like the sun after countless long nights, and they will no longer know the tragedy of age and decay.|[[Scarlet Sand Slate#Delving Deeper|Scarlet Sand Slate: Delving Deeper]]}}
